title: Portfolio Website
description: This is the website you are currently on! it was made to help me learn React by building an app.

title: Music Sharing API
description: This project was made to help me learn Flask and Psql. Developed a Flask API for user profiles, song uploads, and groups, fostering a vibrant music-sharing community.

title: Hangman Terminal App
description: I made this project to learn the fundamentals of Python. Created a Python Hangman game with ASCII art displaying real-time progress for enhanced user interaction.
